name.ja: <ruby>金<rt>きん</rt></ruby><ruby>科<rt>か</rt></ruby><ruby>玉<rt>ぎょく</rt></ruby><ruby>条<rt>じょう</rt></ruby>

text.en:
(This card is always treated as a "Crystal" card.)
Place 2 "Crystal Beast" monsters from your Deck face-up in your Spell & Trap Zone as Continuous Spells, then Special Summon 1 "Crystal Beast" monster from your hand or GY with a different name from those cards, and if you do, equip it with this card. When this card leaves the field, destroy that monster. You can only activate 1 "Golden Rule" per turn.
